artist: Artist: Erich Heckel (recto); Artist: August Gaul (verso); Publisher: Galerie Paul Cassirer; Printer: M.W. Lassaly
creditline: Gift of Robert Bulger in honor of Elizabeth and Madelyn Brunner
description: page with prints on two sides--winter landscape with bare trees, church, and houses on recto; mountain goats and text on verso
title: Near Ghent (Bei Gent) (recto) and Mountain Goats (Bergziegen) (verso), page from "Der Bildermann", folio 31, vol. 1, no. 15
